# CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.control

**Case**

Control character set (Unicode General Category Cc and Cf).

## Declaration

```swift
case control
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.alphaNumeric**: Alpha Numeric character set (Unicode General Category L*, M*, & N*).
- **CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.capitalizedLetter**: Titlecase character set (Unicode General Category Lt).
- **CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.decimalDigit**: Decimal digit character set.
- **CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.decomposable**: Canonically decomposable character set.
- **CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.illegal**: Illegal character set.
- **CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.letter**: Letter character set (Unicode General Category L* & M*).
- **CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.lowercaseLetter**: Lowercase character set (Unicode General Category Ll).
- **CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.newline**: Newline character set (`U000A ~ U000D`, `U0085`, `U2028`, and `U2029`).
- **CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.nonBase**: Non-base character set (Unicode General Category M*).
- **CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.punctuation**: Punctuation character set (Unicode General Category P*).
- **CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.symbol**: Symbol character set (Unicode General Category S*).
- **CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.uppercaseLetter**: Uppercase character set (Unicode General Category Lu and Lt).
- **CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.whitespace**: Whitespace character set (Unicode General Category Zs and U0009 CHARACTER TABULATION).
- **CFCharacterSetPredefinedSet.whitespaceAndNewline**: Whitespace and Newline character set (Unicode General Category Z*, `U000A ~ U000D`, and `U0085`).
